After e6 I wanted to play Be2 cause i wouldnt like my Bishop on b4 anymore.

He s developing his Knight.That controls central dark squares and attacks my Knight on d4. So far it s not a problem for me But things might get worse.
I thought it s time to castle. I am sure you all can see why s it bad move cause my knight on d4 s hanging after Qb6.. I just couldnt concentrate on the game at the moment i made this move.
and my opponent didnt miss the chance of having my knight as a morsel.
Here, It was clear that i am gonna  lose my Knight on d4.With that in mind, i thought I can  set up a counter attack while he s taking  his time  with my Knight on d4.

I think Qxd4 was better. That way He could exchange Queens and when Queens are of the board and i am a piece down, I guess It would be all over already..But my opponent immediately takse my Knight and now he s threating double check next move. I cant let it happen.
So my king ran away.
Now lets look at the position. I am a piece down but I gained tempo with e5 move and forced his Knight back to g8 so i gained one more tempo.
I am trying to have some positional advantage while i am down in material.

His Queen went to a7 square, probably to get rid of my attacks to his Queen. Now I cant attack his Queen anymore and her majesty  protects his knight on d4. But Lets look at Black's position now. He s up a piece but his rook on h8 and Knight g8 has to be developed.He needs two moves to gather himself and build a killing attack But two moves are a lot in chess. He has to find a way.
Here I wanted to open position before he finds time to develop his Knight followed by Castling.
Improving my position with Qc3. I am threating Rd1 next.
Improving my position with Qc3. I am threating Rd1 next.
Here I was expeting him to play some defensive move. But he wants to attack He has seen something.
My only move was Bh4.. Threating f2 next move now. That s my new plan.

So my plan works here after Bf2 I will eventually win my piece backand will have a good positional advantage. But What happened why my opponent played this move?? He appearenty thought i would take the pawn fxg and then hxg!! threating my Bishop plus opening h file and if i take the pawn his rook takes on h2 and Kxe2 mate next move.if i dont take the pawn I cant go to g3 because my Bishop hangs and f2  cant save me anymore. I cant let that happen. So I went for my plan.
He has to protect his knight.
